title: Create development plan (PLAN.md) based on PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION v1.0.0
description: Create PLAN.md document that defines the development roadmap based on the approved PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION.md v1.0.0. The plan should outline all epics, tasks, subtasks, dependencies, and timeline for implementing vite-plugin-open-api-server. This plan will then be used to create all the bd issues for tracking development.

title: Review actual product requirements
description: Review the document until reach production ready (no-draft)
close_reason: Document finalized as v1.0.0 - Approved and ready for implementation

title: Epic: Product requirements specification
description: Product requirements specification about all the needs annd specs for the product that we will develop.
acceptance_criteria: A markdown file will be produced with all the requirements about the product. PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS-SPECIFICATION.md
